properties.name: hangout.jwt.access-token.secret
properties.description: Signing secret key for issued refresh tokens

properties.name: hangout.jwt.access-token.expiry
properties.description: Expiry time for access tokens in ms

properties.name: hangout.jwt.refresh-token.secret
properties.description: Signing secret key for issued refresh tokens

properties.name: hangout.jwt.refresh-token.long-term-expiry
properties.description: Expiry time for long term refresh tokens in ms

properties.name: hangout.jwt.refresh-token.short-term-expiry
properties.description: Expiry time for short term refresh tokens in ms

properties.name: hangout.kafka.topic.verification-mail
properties.description: Topic to send events for newly registered user's email verification

properties.name: hangout.notification-service.url
properties.description: URL of notification service it is used to check jwt token validity when verification link is clicked

properties.name: hangout.kafka.topic.activation-mail
properties.description: Topic to send events for account activation mail

properties.name: hangout.otel-collector.url
properties.description: URL of Open Telemetry collector. It is used to ship telemetry from app to telemetry backends

properties.name: hangout.log.path
properties.description: Log Directory where ogs will be permanently stored

properties.name: hangout.ip-api.url
properties.description: Service used to get details about a device using ip address

properties.name: hangout.internal-services.origin
properties.description: The comma seperated list of the origins of internal services that would communicate with this service

properties.name: hangout.client.origin
properties.description: The comma separated list of the origins of the list of user facing clients
